trans-unit.source: Serializes and deserializes <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> objects into and from XML documents.
trans-unit.target: Serializa e deserializes <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"> </xref> objetos em e documentos XML.

trans-unit.source: XML serialization is the process of converting an object's public properties and fields to a serial format (in this case, XML) for storage or transport.
trans-unit.target: Serialização de XML é o processo de conversão de um objeto propriedades e campos públicos para um série formato (neste caso, XML) de armazenamento ou de transporte.

trans-unit.source: Deserialization re-creates the object in its original state from the XML.
trans-unit.target: A anulação da serialização recria o objeto no seu estado original do XML.

trans-unit.source: The SamlSerializer class serializes and deserializes SAML security tokens, which have an extensible format.
trans-unit.target: A classe de SamlSerializer serializa e deserializes tokens de segurança SAML, que tem um formato extensível.

trans-unit.source: Unlike many other security tokens, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens include XML elements and attributes that can be customized for an application's needs.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário de muitos outros tokens de segurança, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>tokens de segurança incluem elementos XML e atributos que podem ser personalizados para as necessidades de uma aplicação.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: Some of the extensibility points for a SAML assertion include the `<saml:Advice>`, `<saml:Condition>`, and `<saml:Statement>` elements.
trans-unit.target: Alguns dos pontos de extensibilidade para uma asserção SAML incluem o `<saml:Advice>`, `<saml:Condition>`, e `<saml:Statement>` elementos.

trans-unit.source: For more details about overriding how each of these elements are read, see the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.LoadAdvice%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.LoadCondition%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.LoadStatement%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais detalhes sobre como substituir a forma como cada um destes elementos são lidos, consulte o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.LoadAdvice%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.LoadCondition%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29>, e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.LoadStatement%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29>métodos.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.LoadStatement%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.LoadCondition%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.LoadAdvice%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Reads the additional information provided by the SAML authority within a<xref uid="langword_csharp_ <saml:Advice>" name=" <saml:Advice>" href=""></xref> element of a SAML assertion using the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: Lê as informações adicionais fornecidas pela autoridade de SAML dentro de um<xref uid="langword_csharp_ <saml:Advice>" name=" <saml:Advice>" href=""> </xref> elemento de uma asserção SAML utilizando o leitor de XML especificado.

trans-unit.source: The `<saml:Advice>` element within a SAML assertion is an extension point for SAML tokens.
trans-unit.target: O `<saml:Advice>` elemento dentro de uma asserção SAML é um ponto de extensão para SAML tokens.

trans-unit.source: To create a serializer that can read the custom attributes, derive a class from <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer> and override the LoadAdvice method.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um serializador que pode ler os atributos personalizados, uma classe a partir de derivar <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer>e substitua o método LoadAdvice.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> to read the additional information provided by the SAML authority.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>para ler as informações adicionais fornecidas pela autoridade de SAML.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clause of the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref> que lê o <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""> </xref> cláusula da assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token that created the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"> </xref> que determina o token de segurança que criou a assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice"></xref> that contains additional information provided by the SAML authority within a<xref uid="langword_csharp_ <saml:Advice>" name=" <saml:Advice>" href=""></xref> element of a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice"> </xref> que contém informações adicionais fornecidas pela autoridade de SAML dentro de um<xref uid="langword_csharp_ <saml:Advice>" name=" <saml:Advice>" href=""> </xref> elemento de uma asserção SAML.

trans-unit.source: reader is
trans-unit.target: readeré

trans-unit.source: Reads a SAML assertion from the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: Lê uma asserção SAML do leitor XML especificado.

trans-unit.source: A SAML assertion is contained within a `<saml:Assertion>` element.
trans-unit.target: Uma asserção SAML está contida dentro de um `<saml:Assertion>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.ReadToken%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> method calls the LoadAssertion method to read the SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.ReadToken%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29>método chama o método de LoadAssertion ler a asserção SAML.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.ReadToken%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> to read the SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>ler a asserção SAML.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clause of the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref> que lê o <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""> </xref> cláusula da assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token that created the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"> </xref> que determina o token de segurança que criou a assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"></xref> that represents the SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"> </xref> que representa a asserção SAML.

trans-unit.source: reader is
trans-unit.target: readeré

trans-unit.source: Reads an attribute of the subject of a SAML security token using the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: Lê um atributo do requerente de um token de segurança SAML utilizando o leitor de XML especificado.

trans-unit.source: When an application defines its own set of attributes, which is possible because SAML attributes is an extensibility point, a serializer that understands how to read those attributes is needed.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma aplicação define seu próprio conjunto de atributos, que é possível porque os atributos SAML é um ponto de extensibilidade, um serializador que compreende como ler esses atributos é necessária.

trans-unit.source: A SAML attribute is different than an XML attribute.
trans-unit.target: Um atributo SAML é diferente de um atributo XML.

trans-unit.source: A SAML attribute is contained within a `<saml:Attribute>` element and can contain any well-formed XML, not just an attribute.
trans-unit.target: Um atributo SAML está contido dentro de um `<saml:Attribute>` elemento e pode conter qualquer um XML corretamente formado, não apenas um atributo.

trans-unit.source: To create a serializer that can read the custom attributes, derive a class from <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer> and override the LoadAttribute method.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um serializador que pode ler os atributos personalizados, uma classe a partir de derivar <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer>e substitua o método LoadAttribute.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> to read the attributes.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>ler os atributos.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clause of the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref> que lê o <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""> </xref> cláusula da assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token that created the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"> </xref> que determina o token de segurança que criou a assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttribute"></xref> that represents a claim that is an attribute of the subject of a SAML security token.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttribute"> </xref> que representa uma afirmação que é um atributo do requerente de um token de segurança SAML.

trans-unit.source: Reads a condition that must be taken into account when assessing the validity of a SAML assertion using the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: Lê uma condição que deve ser levada em consideração ao avaliar a validade de uma asserção SAML utilizando o leitor de XML especificado.

trans-unit.source: When an application defines its own set of conditions, which is possible because the `<saml:Condition>` element is an extensibility point, a serializer that understands how to read those conditions is needed.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma aplicação define o seu próprio conjunto de condições, o que é possível porque o `<saml:Condition>` elemento é um ponto de extensibilidade, é necessário um serializador que compreende como as condições de leitura.

trans-unit.source: To create a serializer that can read the custom attributes, derive a class from <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer> and override the LoadCondition method.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um serializador que pode ler os atributos personalizados, uma classe a partir de derivar <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer>e substitua o método LoadCondition.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> to read the SAML condition.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>ler a condição SAML.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clause of the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref> que lê o <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""> </xref> cláusula da assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token that created the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"> </xref> que determina o token de segurança que criou a assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlCondition"></xref> that specifies a condition that must be taken into account when assessing the validity of a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlCondition"> </xref> que especifica uma condição que deve ser levada em consideração ao avaliar a validade de uma asserção SAML.

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: Reads a set of conditions that must be taken into account when assessing the validity of a SAML assertion using the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: Lê um conjunto de condições que devem ser levados em consideração ao avaliar a validade de uma asserção SAML utilizando o leitor de XML especificado.

trans-unit.source: The LoadConditions method reads the contents of a `<saml:Conditions>` element.
trans-unit.target: O método LoadConditions lê os conteúdos de um `<saml:Conditions>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> to read the SAML conditions.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>para ler as condições SAML.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clause of the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref> que lê o <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""> </xref> cláusula da assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token that created the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"> </xref> que determina o token de segurança que criou a assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions"></xref> that specifies a set of conditions that must be taken into account when assessing the validity of a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions"> </xref> que especifica um conjunto de condições que devem ser levados em consideração ao avaliar a validade de uma asserção SAML.

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: Reads a SAML statement using the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: Lê uma instrução de SAML utilizando o leitor de XML especificado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions where the details of the claims are specified in SAML statements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>tokens de segurança especificar as afirmações utilizando asserções de SAML onde os detalhes das afirmações são especificados em declarações de SAML.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: The SAML specification defines the following statement types: - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement> - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement> - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement> - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement> The LoadStatement method reads the SAML statements listed previously.
trans-unit.target: A especificação de SAML define os seguintes tipos de instrução:- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement>- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement>- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement>LoadStatement o método lê as declarações de SAML listadas anteriormente.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement>

trans-unit.source: When custom statements are defined and used by an application, create a serializer to read the contents of them.
trans-unit.target: Quando instruções personalizadas são definidas e utilizadas por uma aplicação, crie um serializador para ler o conteúdo dos mesmos.

trans-unit.source: To create the custom serializer, derive a class from <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer> and override the LoadStatement method.
trans-unit.target: Para criar o serializador personalizado, uma classe a partir de derivar <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer>e substitua o método LoadStatement.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Custom SAML statements are contained within a `<saml:Statement>` element.
trans-unit.target: Instruções de SAML personalizadas estão contidas dentro de um `<saml:Statement>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> to read the SAML statement.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>para ler a declaração de SAML.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clause of the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref> que lê o <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""> </xref> cláusula da assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token that created the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"> </xref> que determina o token de segurança que criou a assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlStatement"></xref> that represents the SAML statement.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlStatement"> </xref> que representa a instrução de SAML.

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: Replaces the default set of XML elements and attributes that are recognized by this serializer with the specified dictionary of elements and attributes.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o conjunto de elementos XML e atributos que são reconhecidos por este serializador com o dicionário especificado de elementos e atributos predefinidos.

trans-unit.source: Use the PopulateDictionary method when a custom set of XML elements is defined for one of the extensibility points of a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o método de PopulateDictionary quando personalizadas conjunto de elementos XML está definido para um dos pontos de extensibilidade de uma asserção SAML.

trans-unit.source: Extensibility points for a SAML assertion include the `<saml:Advice>`, `<saml:Condition>`, and `<saml:Statement>` elements.
trans-unit.target: Pontos de extensibilidade para uma asserção SAML incluem o `<saml:Advice>`, `<saml:Condition>`, e `<saml:Statement>` elementos.

trans-unit.source: For more details about overriding how each of these elements are read, see the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.LoadAdvice%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.LoadCondition%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.LoadStatement%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais detalhes sobre como substituir a forma como cada um destes elementos são lidos, consulte o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.LoadAdvice%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.LoadCondition%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29>, e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.LoadStatement%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29>métodos.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.LoadStatement%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.LoadCondition%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.LoadAdvice%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.IXmlDictionary> that contains the set of XML elements and attributes.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.IXmlDictionary>que contém o conjunto de atributos e elementos XML.</xref:System.Xml.IXmlDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Reads a SAML security token from the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: Lê um token de segurança SAML do leitor XML especificado.

trans-unit.source: The ReadToken method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.LoadAssertion%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> method to read the SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas de método ReadToken o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.LoadAssertion%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29>método ler a asserção SAML.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.LoadAssertion%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> to read the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>para ler o <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"> </xref> token de segurança.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clause of the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref> que lê o <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""> </xref> cláusula da assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token that created the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"> </xref> que determina o token de segurança que criou a assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"> </xref> token de segurança.

trans-unit.source: reader is
trans-unit.target: readeré

trans-unit.source: reader refers to an XML element that does not contain a digital signature.
trans-unit.target: readerrefere-se a um elemento XML que não contém uma assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: Writes the specified SAML security token into the specified XML serializer.
trans-unit.target: Escreve o token de segurança SAML especificado para o serializador XML especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the WriteToken method to serialize a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security token.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar o método de WriteToken para serializar um <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>token de segurança.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: To deserialize a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.ReadToken%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> method.
trans-unit.target: Para anular a serialização de um <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>utilizar o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.ReadToken%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer.ReadToken%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> to write.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"> </xref> escrever.
